attributes.action: UK Driving Licence Should To Be Linked With All UK Car Insurance Websites
attributes.additional_details: The reason i request our car driving licence details should be linked on the UK Car insurance websites, to protect us by ban drivers,dangerous drivers, young drivers & to cut down for false driving licence details is used by criminals every day but cut down false car insurance claims by checking the persons driving licence details with DVLA Database & if a criminal offence has taken placed then they can contact police.

rejection.details: The DVLA already has links with the insurance industry, so no change is proposed by the petition.
